title: What are some tips to improve my skills as a radiologic technologist? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say: Master your knowledge of anatomy and radiograpic anatomy.Master Merrill's Atlas of Radiograpic Positioning.Master the equipment you use. Read the technical documentation. Practice the knobology.Learn imaging informatics. Understand the workflow in your department and how RIS, PACS and the EMR work within it.
